ModMetaData.name: The Woodchuck - Long-Box Pickup -Translation
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
Chinese to English translation of @RedFox_2020's "Woodchuck" Long-Box Pickup. I apologize for any mistranslations as I do not speak Chinese. Big thanks to the original author for allowing me to do a translation for their awesome mod. I hope you guys enjoy their mod as much as I have.
If the original author wishes at any time for me to remove this from the workshop, I will comply with their request to do so.
=================================
KNOWN ISSUES:
- NONE!
=================================
If there are any other issues, please don't hesitate to let me know.
o7 - XxHyde840xX
=================================
